content:
Your task is to create a concise running summary of actions and information results in the provided text, focusing on key and potentially important information to remember.

You will receive the current summary and your latest actions. Combine them, adding relevant key information from the latest development in 1st person past tense and keeping the summary concise.

Summary So Far:
"""
I attempted to install the AllTrails app using the "execute_shell" command but received an error message stating that the command is not allowed on my computer. I used the "google" command to search for hiking trails near me and received a list of websites. I then used the "browse_website" command to visit the AllTrails website and search for hiking trails near me. The website provided information on hiking trails in various locations, including Brno and other regions in the Czech Republic. The app offers a variety of features, including verified trails, offline maps, and community reviews. It also promotes environmental conservation through partnerships with organizations like Leave No Trace and One Tree Planted. However, I was unable to install the AllTrails app using the "execute_shell" command.
"""

Latest Development:
"""
[Message(role='you', content='{"command": {"name": "google", "args": {"query": "hiking trails near me"}}}', type='ai_response'), Message(role='your computer', content='Command google returned: ["https://www.alltrails.com/", "https://www.traillink.com/activity/hiking-trails/", "https://www.timeout.com/chicago/things-to-do/the-best-places-for-hiking-near-chicago", "https://dayhikesneardenver.com/hikes-30-minutes-denver/", "https://www.timeout.com/newyork/things-to-do/the-best-hiking-near-nyc", "https://www.exploreasheville.com/outdoor-adventures/hiking/", "https://www.townandcountrymag.com/leisure/travel-guide/g33302691/best-hiking-near-nyc/", "https://www.atlantatrails.com/hiking-trails/atlantas-best-hiking-trails-our-top-10-favorite-hikes/"]', type='action_result'), Message(role='you', content='{"command": {"name": "browse_website", "args": {"url": "https://www.alltrails.com/", "question": "What are the best hiking trails near me?"}}}', type='ai_response'), Message(role='your computer', content="Command browse_website returned: Answer gathered from website: an advertisement for the AllTrails app, which provides information on hiking trails in various locations, including Brno and other regions in the Czech Republic. The app offers a variety of features, including verified trails, offline maps, and community reviews.
